t: Can you sell generic items on Amazon? - Riverbend Consulting
s: December 18, 2024 - Generic items on Amazon are unbranded items with no recognizable name or logo. Think of them as the “no-name” goods on store shelves—functional but lacking that extra appeal from a trusted brand.
